author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...FLOSSIE EXPECTED TO BRING AREAS OF HEAVY RAINS ALONG THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO...
summary: ...FLOSSIE EXPECTED TO BRING AREAS OF HEAVY RAINS ALONG THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 6:00 PM CST Sun Jun 29 the center of Flossie was located near 13.7, -100.7 with movement WNW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...FLOSSIE EXPECTED TO BRING AREAS OF HEAVY RAINS ALONG THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 6:00 PM CST Sun Jun 29 the center of Flossie was located near 13.7, -100.7 with movement WNW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Storm Flossie (EP1/EP062025)
